I use it to build a time machine to go to the future.

I give 1 bar and a slip of gold pressed latinum to the next user.

I digest the latinum and store it in my secondary stomach. It's okay, though, I already lost most of my hair.

I'll give away six hours of my next workday.

Which I have you spend playing KSP.

I give Dres and a million funds to the next user, as long as I keep the rights to mine Dres-teroids.

I crate the SPUD Coalition,

I give the million unused dollars to the next user.

I spend one half on charity and store the other one in a secret underground bunker for tougher times. ![lpg6USA.png](http://i.imgur.com/lpg6USA.png)

I give the next use a small loan of a million ice cubes.

Takes the million ice cubes and builds a castle. Charges admission of $5.00 as an entry fee to see the castle!

I give the next forum member a million rubber bands...

I use the rubber bands to make a huge band ball, creating a tourist attraction.

I make millions in profit.

I give a half-eaten waffle that some kid dropped to the next user.

This waffle has the cure to cancer!  I market it and make the price way too high, and become a multibillionaire.

I give the next person a dollar, a piece of string, and a bottle cap.

\*gets a model rocket from jebs junkyard\*

Next poster gets.....a gtx titan X and 1 wad of putty and 10 singapore dollars.

I place GTX Titan and try play Crysis 3, Then PC melt. I use 10 singapore dollars to repair PC.

Next User get a Baikonur cosmodrome and X-Wing

The next user receives $600!

Woo! I put it in my savings account.

To the next poster I give all the gold in my blood!

That's not very much... I'll buy a piece of dust approximately one millimeter wide.

I give the next poster ALL THE PLANETS!

Sweet! time to sell shares of them on wall street!

I give the next person 1 penny.

Well, now I have something to send to orbit.

Congratulations, next poster! You are the 9999st person to visit the KSP forums! Click here to receive 1 million funds!

Thanks for the free virus!

I give the next poster... an iPhone camera. Just the camera, nothing else. As if I extracted the camera out of an iPhone.

Cool! I wonder if I can hack it into my tiny drone?

The next poster receives 1 boiled dollar. As in it was cooked thoroughly in boiling water beforehand.

Oh, yay.... I think I'll go spend it on a candy bar and try and get some less-boiled currency.

The next poster gets $400 in the mail!

Mhm... $400? Uh...

I will spend it on upgrading my computer rig.

Next poster recieve a....\*insert drumroll\*

$1 of alien currency!

I inspect it under the microscope for signs of alien microorganisms.

Next poster receives 1 gram of silver gas.

OW OW HOT HOT! Silver's boiling point is like, well... MAKES IT A BIT TOO WARM TO GIVE SOMEONE.

I give the next poster a gram of TUNGSTEN gas.... Pre-heated to thousands of degrees as necessary for it to exist.

That will do good in my sona

Next person gets Jebediah's Gas

As I now have an unlimited quantity of propellant, I create a space cannon with which I dwarf the payloads of even the largest of lifters.

I pass on to the next user a small^1^ asteroid, whose core is largely gold and platinum-group metals.

^1^Small: A-Class.
